thread.title: The North Face’s SS17 Editorial Features Moscow Fashion Insiders
thread.title_full: The North Face’s SS17 Editorial Features Moscow Fashion Insiders

author: Alec Leach
title: The North Face’s SS17 Editorial Features Moscow Fashion Insiders
text:
Visit the original post to see all 10 images from this gallery. 
The North Face drops an editorial from Russia, highlighting select pieces from the outerwear brand’s SS17 collection of high-tech outdoors gear.
Snapped by Leonid Sorokin , the shoot features Moscow industry insiders Avdotja Alexandrova and Vsevolod “Sever” Cherepanov. Avdotja founded Lumpen , a Moscow modeling agency that specializes in unusual and less commercial faces (“lumpen” is Russian for outcast or outsider) — her guys have walked for the likes of Gosha Rubchinskiy and COMME des GARÇONS — and Sever is one of the company’s most well-known faces.
For SS17, The North Face has a bevy of outerwear for all sorts of demanding weather conditions, alongside cozy branded basics for less adventurous TNF aficionados. Color-wise, things are mainly low-key and neutral, with the exception of some bright hi-vis orange — so you’ll stand out on the street and/or mountainside.
Check out our street style story with Sever.
